Package cz.cvut.fel.constructa.service

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.constructa.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
The UserServiceImpl class implements the UserService interface and provides operations related to the User model.
